about_the_game:
A witch has kidnapped the prince and the princess. As the royal wizard, it is your mission to rescue both at once, but first you'll have to learn to control your two bodies simultaneously.

With a series of quick single-screen platforming levels, Ambidextro will help you master controlling two characters at the same time, one with each hand. Learn to split your focus and tackle increasingly challenging levels you would have thought impossible.

· A multi-player game for a single player.

· Control one character with each hand.

· Make your two-halves meet before the time runs out.

· 100 increasingly challenging levels.

· Retro dark-fantasy atmosphere with a fantastic soundtrack.

short_description: What if you could use just 50% of your brain? Learn to control 2 characters simultaneously in short platforming levels of progressing difficulty. Achieve ambidexterity and rescue both the prince and the princess at the same time.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese
